text: Joseph Anthony Fiorenza (January 25, 1931 - September 19, 2022) was an American prelate of the Catholic Church. He was the seventh Bishop and the first Archbishop of Galveston-Houston from 1985 to 2006. He was Bishop of San Angelo from 1979 to 1984. He was born in Beaumont, Texas. ==References== Category:People from Beaumont, Texas Category:People from San Angelo, Texas Category:American Roman Catholic archbishops Category:1931 births Category:2022 deaths
title: Joseph Fiorenza
